    B

    Book - Class in domain
    Represents a book in the library system.
    Book() - Constructor for class domain.Book
    Default constructor.
    Book(String, String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Book
    Constructs a Book with the specified details.
    Book(String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class domain.Book
    Constructs a Book with the specified details and borrowed state.
    BookAuthorSearchStrategy - Class in applicationsearchbooks
    Search strategy that matches books by author name.
    BookAuthorSearchStrategy() - Constructor for class applicationsearchbooks.BookAuthorSearchStrategy
    Creates a new BookAuthorSearchStrategy.
    BookIsbnSearchStrategy - Class in applicationsearchbooks
    Search strategy that matches books by ISBN.
    BookIsbnSearchStrategy() - Constructor for class applicationsearchbooks.BookIsbnSearchStrategy
    Creates a new BookIsbnSearchStrategy.
    BookRepository - Class in persistence
    Repository class for managing Book entities in temporary storage.
    BookRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.BookRepository
    Creates a new BookRepository with empty in-memory storage.
    BookSearchStrategy - Interface in applicationsearchbooks
    Strategy interface for searching collections of books by a specific criterion.
    BookService - Class in application
    Service layer for managing books in the library system.
    BookService() - Constructor for class application.BookService
    Creates a BookService with no repository configured.
    BookService(BookRepository) - Constructor for class application.BookService
    Constructs a BookService with the specified repository.
    BookTitleSearchStrategy - Class in applicationsearchbooks
    Search strategy that matches books by title.
    BookTitleSearchStrategy() - Constructor for class applicationsearchbooks.BookTitleSearchStrategy
    Creates a new BookTitleSearchStrategy.
    borrow(String, String) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Borrows a book identified by its ISBN for the given user.
    borrowAt(LocalDate) - Method in class domain.Media
    Marks this media as borrowed at the given date; due date is set using policy.
    borrowCD(Member, String, LocalDate) - Method in class application.CDService
    Borrows a CD by its id for the given member starting on borrowDate.
    BorrowingRules - Class in application
    Encapsulates borrowing eligibility rules for library members.
    BorrowingRules() - Constructor for class application.BorrowingRules
    Creates a new instance of BorrowingRules with default policy.
    borrowMedia(Admin, Member, Media, LocalDate) - Method in class application.AdminActions
    Borrows media for a member using the loan service.
    borrowMedia(Member, Media, LocalDate) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Borrows generic media for a member using default media rules.
    borrowMedia(Member, Media, LocalDate, Integer) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Borrows generic media with a custom number of days.
    borrowMediaTestDuration(Admin, Member, Media, LocalDate, int, int, int, int) - Method in class application.AdminActions
    Testing-only polymorphic borrow method with advanced custom duration.
    borrowMediaTestDuration(Member, Media, int) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Testing-only borrow with a duration expressed in seconds.
    borrowMediaTestDuration(Member, Media, LocalDate, int, int, int, int) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Testing-only borrow with custom days/hours/minutes/seconds.
